page.title: 13 HOLIDAYS.
page.content: WE CARRIED OUT A{SAMPLE SURVEY}OF FAMILIES IN OUR SCHOOL TO SEE WHERE PEOPLE ARE GOING FOR THEIR {HOLIDAYS IN 1985.THIS IS WHAT WE FOUND OUT FROM 76 FAMILIES SURVEYED.{50%}HAVE A HOLIDAY IN{BRITAIN.}MOST GO TO THE {SEASIDE}AND STAY IN A HOTEL OR RENTED HOUSES.MOST PEOPLE TRAVEL BY CAR AND STAY BETWEEN{1-2 WEEKS. {25%}ONLY GO FOR{DAYTRIPS.}THIS IS OFTEN A VISIT TO THE SEASIDE BUT SOME GO TO{LEISURE PARKS}OR{SWIMMING BATHS. TRAVEL BY CAR IS MOST POPULAR. FINALLY,WE FOUND THAT{10%}ARE GOING ABROARD.ALL ARE GOING TO {EUROPE}AND THE MOST POPULAR COUNTRY IS{SPAIN.} PEOPLE MAINLY STAY IN {HOTELS}NEAR THE SEA AND STAY FOR A LONGER HOLIDAY OF 2 OR MORE WEEKS.THE MAIN WAY OF TRAVELLING IS BY AEROPLANE BUT NOW MANY PEOPLE TRAVEL ALL THE WAY TO THEIR HOTEL BY {A FAST COACH.
